t: Replace a Damaged, Defective, or Broken Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can replace items eligible for replacement through Your Orders. If the item doesn't have a replacement option or you received the item as a gift, you'll need to return the original item and place a new order. To return an item, visit Returns Items You Ordered.

t: How do replacements work?
s: November 14, 2023 - Always go to Manage Returns, and look for the Replacement Requested Logo on each return request so you do not refund them! Amazon will send the order through only when the buyer dropped off their return, and a scan is shown. If they do not return it, then don't issue a refund.

t: How to Replace Items on Amazon.ae - Amazon Customer Service
s: In most cases, you are required to return the original item received for a replacement. You'll need to return the original item within the stated return window to avoid being charged for both the original and replaced items.

t: Amazon created replacement order
s: January 15, 2024 - Amazon automatically offers free replacement or refund. Ship the free replacement item, keep a record of the original order and if it is not returned within 60 days Amazon should reimburse you. If they don't, file a claim for reimbursement. This is Amazon policy.
